resources.string: This device implements the Camera2 interface which are approximately the same capabilities as those exposed to apps through the older Camera1 interface. \n\nLEGACY devices do not support Camera API2 features such as ISO and EV settings or per-frame controls.
This device supports some, but not all, Camera2 capabilities and must use the Camera HAL 3.2 or later.
This device supports all of the major capabilities of the Camera API2 and must use the Camera HAL 3.2 or later and Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or later.
This device supports YUV reprocessing and RAW image capture, along with additional output stream configurations.

\tWithout camera permissions, this app cannot query the camera hardware for supported features. \n\nThe camera will NEVER take an actual picture, no image data is created and the results of the device query are not saved.
